inclusion.criterion: current or recent treatment with antidepressant
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: decide to discontinue antidepressant medication for pregnancy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ongoing psychiatric care provided by a physician outside the MGH Center for Women's Mental Health
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: significant risk for self-harm or harm to others
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: meeting criteria for a primary SCID-I/P diagnosis of schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, an active eating disorder, dementia, delirium, or other cognitive disorder
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: presence of an active substance and/or alcohol abuse disorder within six months prior to screening visit
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: current use of mood stabilizers, antipsychotics or antiepileptics
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: have received cognitive-behavioral or interpersonal therapy within the last year
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: diagnosed with a medical disorder that has a known association with depressive symptoms (e.g. thyroid disorder)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 67-year-old healthy woman, no underlying disease, first vaccination this year.
